description: Example custom ranking criteria - modify to suit your preferences

criteria.name: Content Quality
criteria.description: Is the content well-written, informative, and substantive?

criteria.name: Contextual Relevance
criteria.description: How well does this match the current context (day/time/mood)?

criteria.name: Practical Value
criteria.description: Does this provide actionable insights or useful information?

criteria.name: Uniqueness
criteria.description: Is this offering new perspectives or just repeating common knowledge?

criteria.name: Reading Time Match
criteria.description: Does the content depth match the available reading time?

scoringGuidelines.description: Poor quality, clickbait, completely irrelevant, or misleading content
Low quality but might have minimal interest, repetitive or shallow content
Average quality, moderately interesting, standard coverage of topic
High quality, very relevant, valuable insights, well-researched content
Exceptional quality, must-read content, unique insights, perfect context match

additionalInstructions: Be honest and critical in your evaluation
Consider the specific context provided when scoring
Provide detailed reasoning that explains your score
Focus on value to the user rather than general quality metrics

_comments.criteria: List of evaluation criteria - modify weights to prioritize different aspects
_comments.scoringGuidelines: Score ranges and descriptions - customize for your content types
_comments.additionalInstructions: Extra guidance for the AI evaluator
